name: Blue Login Style
author: Ali Mirzaei

sections.description:
Blue Login Style is a tiny WordPress plugin that allows you to customize your login page with beautiful themes. Its features: ability to add message, change the login logo, ability to set login, logout and register redirect links and many more…
Screenshots are available in Here

Features

  • Ability to choose nice themes with great options.
  • Ability to add message in your login page.
  • Add a custom logo of your wordPress blog as piece of cake.
  • Add custom background image.
  • Ability to set login, logout and register redirect links.
  • Simple configuration panel.
  • And so on…

Plugin Author

Website: Ali Mirzaei
Follow on Facebook
You can catch catch me on twitter as @alimirir
sections.installation:
1. Upload blue-login files to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress.
  3. Select your favorite theme in Blue Themes panel.
  4. Set your custom logo in Login Options panel.
